synopsis.text: Following the footsteps of their late father, siblings Ryuuji and Kiku Takane embark on a journey to claim the title of boxing champion. As Ryuuji steps into the ring, armed with his newly acquired Boomerang Hook technique, his sister Kiku takes on the role of his dedicated trainer. Through a series of intense matches with formidable opponents, Ryuuji evolves into a mature and skilled boxer. As the junior high boxing tournament commences, Ryuuji prepares to face his arch-rival, Jun Kenzaki, in a battle that promises to test the limits of his strength and determination. With the spirit of their father guiding them, Ryuuji and Kiku strive to bring honor to their family name in the world of boxing.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
